title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bridget Phetasy, Steve Earnest, & Capt. Casey Murray  | 10/28/21
description:
Southwest Airlines Pilots Association president Capt. Casey Murray returns after a judge rejected pilots’ bid to block Southwest’s vaccine mandate. Theatre professor Steve Earnest joins to tell his story as a group of students demand that he be fired for not being outraged enough. Comedian Bridget Phetasy joins Glenn to talk life in authoritarian pandemic-era California.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
